bannerTitle1: Public API Access Services to Polkadot Ecosystem
bannerTitle2: Elara provides Polkadot developers with free, instant and scalable blockchain API access services, including Polkadot, Kusama, etc.
NoNeed: Developers can directly use our JSON-RPC interface based on HTTPS and WebSocket to access the Polkadot network without synchronizing blocks and complex settings.
ElaraHandles: Elara will handle all network changes and upgrades, dedicated in providing high stability and high availability services. This allows developers to simplify application infrastructure and focus on building upper-level applications
Ourhighly: Our highly scalable infrastructure ensures rapid access to all relay chains, parachains, and independent chains based on Substrate in the Polkadot ecosystem, allowing developers to quickly deploy their applications to new networks
WeProvide: If the amount of application Bandwidth exceeds the account free quota, developers can contact us at any time to provide customized solutions.
YouCan: You can contact us through the following channels, we will provide you with customized solutions
All networks in the Polkadot ecosystem: All networks in the Polkadot ecosystem
Public API Access Service for Polkadot E: Public API Access Service for Polkadot Ecosystem

listPage.Name: Name
listPage.FormatError: Format error, normal format: English upper and lower case letters, length 4-32

tip.invalidName: Please enter 4 - 16 digits of the alphabet
tip.MaxNum: Elara provides 10 free projects for developers, if you need customization, please contact us
tip.MaxBandwidth: The total daily bandwidth limit is 10GB
tip.MaxRequest: The total daily requests limit is 1,000,000
tip.RequestNumTip: you can customize the daily request limit on the "Settings" page
tip.BandwidthNumTip: you can customize the daily bandwidth limit on the "Settings" page
tip.EmptyConclusion: Elara provides Polkadot developers with free, instant and scalable blockchain API access services.
tip.EmptyParagraph2: 2. Enter the project name and select the type of chain
tip.EmptyParagraph3: 3. Copy the endpoint link and send the API request
tip.EmptyParagraph4: 4. View statistics on the "Requests" page of the project
tip.EmptyParagraph5: 5. Modify project restrictions on the "Settings" page of the project
tip.PublicEndpointDoc: You can also use the public API provided by us without creating an account, but it will be subject to a bandwidth limit of 50MB/s (shared by everyone).
